TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpWriter extends System.IO.TextWriter

Docs.summary: Provides a <xref:System.IO.TextWriter> object that is accessed through the intrinsic object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Write%2A> methods of the intrinsic <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse> object make internal calls to an HttpWriter object.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Close ();

Docs.summary: Sends all buffered output to the HTTP output stream and closes the socket connection.

Docs.value: An instance of the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> class indicating the character set of the current response.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Stream OutputStream { get; }

Docs.summary: Gets a <xref:System.IO.Stream> object to enable HTTP output directly from the <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
Docs.value: An instance of the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class containing the data to send to the client
